text: Tara eta'i kamana kare ye, tara yerupa kuphari kareche tomara'o serupa kuphari kara, yate tomara tadera samana haye ya'o. Kaje'i allahara pathe hijarata [1] na kara paryanta tadera madhya theke ka'uke'o bandhurupe grahana karabe na. Yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe taderake yekhane pabe grephatara karabe ebam hatya karabe ara tadera madhya theke ka'uke'o bandhu o sahayarupe grahana karabe na
